name: Lavender Needle Felted Ball
description: It could be used as a air freshener in your wardrobe or in a car or just as a decoration which could be hanged on the string wherever you desire. Lavender buds were felted into the center of each ball, then each was scented with organic lavender oil. 5 cm handmade felt balls. Hand stitched using a fluffy wire.

name: Lavender Needle Felted Ball
description: It could be used as a air freshener in your wardrobe or in a car or just as a decoration which could be hanged on the string wherever you desire. Lavender buds were felted into the center of each ball, then each was scented with organic lavender oil. 5 cm handmade felt balls. Hand stitched with a ribbon.

name: Scented Needle Felted Blue Octopus
description:
He is cute, a bit sleepy and completely unique.
He is hand-made from pure sheep wool using a process called needle felting, where wool is sculpted and shaped to create a desired design. His body is supported on four wires which also I have felted and can be moved to various position.
Lavender buds were felted into the center of of the body, then was scented with organic lavender oil. He is adorable and very lovable. 16 cm long.

My sculptures are delicate pieces of art and are not intended to be a toy for children

name: Scented Needle Felted Grumpy Fish
description:
He is cute, colorful and completely unique.
He is hand-made from pure sheep wool using a process called needle felting, where wool is sculpted and shaped to create a desired design.
Lavender buds were felted into the center of of the body, then was scented with organic lavender oil. The nylon bead wire is sawn on his back so the little fish could be hanging on door handles or windows or just on the wall as a ornament. He is adorable and very lovable. 13 cm long.

My sculptures are delicate pieces of art and are not intended to be a toy for children
